description: This file sets up an AI reasoning agent using the 'Agent' class, configures it with specific tools and a model, and creates a web application playground to interact with the agent. It also includes code to run the app if executed as the main module.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A specific AI model from Anthropic used for reasoning.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: A class to create a web-based playground interface for the agent.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Tools to assist in reasoning tasks.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for financial data retrieval and analysis.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Method to generate the web application from the Playground class.

methods.name: serve_playground_app
methods.description: Function to serve the playground web app, with optional reload.
